scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma! I’d really like a photograph of
us!

A “photograph”? You mean you wanna take
a picture?

When we were together earlier, Minoru, Saki
and the others took a photograph, right?

Once I saw that I really wanted to capture
a memory of us together.
(A memory of us together does sound nice.)

(I wouldn’t mind having a photograph.
But where?)
Should we take it here in the classroom?

Hmm... I guess we don’t have to take it here
if we don’t want to.

But this is where we’ve slept and talked and
everything, so...
So I think right here would be perfect!
Okay! Then come over here and let’s take it!
Roger!
Lemme just change it to selfie mode...
Hey, can you move a little over that way?
How about this?
Okay, here we go. Three, two, one, cheese!
Did you take it?
Yeah. See, look.
Wow! It looks just like us! Amazing!
That’s what photos are for, haha!

I’m so happy... Now it feels like I can be at
your side forever.

(I wonder if Agumon is worried that we might
get separated...)
(That must be why he wanted the photo.)

Hey, Takuma... Have you enjoyed our time
together?
Huh? Why do you ask that all of a sudden?
Come on, just give me an answer.

(If he means whether I’ve enjoyed myself, the
answer is pretty obvious.)

(“Enjoying” isn’t the right way to put it,
though... It’s just natural at this point.)
(Would he freak out if I said I wasn’t sure?)
(What should I say to Agumon?)
Yes, I have!
It feels natural.
Hm, I dunno...
Yes, I have!

Of course I’ve enjoyed it! You’ve helped me
so much.

How can I put this...? You make me feel calm,
like there’s another me around.

I feel the same! I thought so as soon as
I first felt our bond.
It feels natural.

It just feels natural for us be together. Why
do you feel the need to ask?
You mean you didn’t enjoy it?
No, not like that at all!

It just feels like a given. I can’t imagine
things any other way.

That’s why...how do I say this... I guess I’d
say it’s been amazing being together!

What a relief! Me, too. I’ve thought so ever
since the first time I felt our bond.
Hm, I dunno...
I guess I’d say I enjoyed it...
I just don’t know how to answer, really.
So...you DID enjoy it then?
(I feel like I’m being a little mean to him.)

Just kidding, Agumon. Being with you is the
best!

Well look at you, grinning like a barracuda!
You’re a regular joker, huh?
Sorry, sorry!

Anyway, I’m glad to hear it! I think being
with you is the best, too!

I’ve always thought so, ever since I first
felt our bond.

Speaking of which, the first time we met you
said you’d been waiting for me.
Yeah, I’d been waiting and waiting...

But how did you know it was me you were
waiting for?

I can’t really explain it...but the moment
I saw you, I just knew!

So it just hit you? Like some kind of psychic
message?

Like our hearts or souls are connected
somehow?

A psy-what? Anyway, our souls being connected
sounds about right!

All I can say is, the moment I laid eyes on
you I thought, “It’s him! He’s the one!”

(Looking back, I think I felt like our souls
were connected, too.)

(The second I saw Agumon, I felt something
stir deep inside me...)

(I wonder if Minoru, Aoi and the others feel
the same way...)
(It’s all pretty strange.)

(Maybe it really was fate that brought us all
together.)
Er, Takuma? You look kinda zoned out.
Oh, uh... It’s nothing.

Anyway, how about we take another picture
somewhere else while we’re at it?

Oh, yes! I’d love to take more photographs
with you!

Okay! Let’s look outside the school and try
to get more of it on film.
